Scripts.OnLoad: local name = self:GetName() -- Darken unselected tabs _G[name.."Left"]:SetVertexColor(0.6, 0.6, 0.6) _G[name.."Middle"]:SetVertexColor(0.6, 0.6, 0.6) _G[name.."Right"]:SetVertexColor(0.6, 0.6, 0.6) -- Store highlight references self.leftHighlight = _G[name.."LeftHighlight"] self.middleHighlight = _G[name.."MiddleHighlight"] self.rightHighlight = _G[name.."RightHighlight"] self.text = _G[name.."Text"] self.isSelected = false
Scripts.OnEnter: if not self.isSelected then self.leftHighlight:Show() self.middleHighlight:Show() self.rightHighlight:Show() end
